full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify - Stage 2 Pedestrian Crossing at Rouge Urban National Park

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation number: 5P468-23-0225/A
* Publication date: March 15, 2024
* Tender closing date: April 4, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected contract start date: April 9, 2024
* Expected contract end date: July 31, 2024

## Procurement Details

* Procurement category: Construction Services
* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: Canada
* Regions of delivery: Canada

## Project Overview

Parks Canada requires the installation of a pedestrian crossover on Twyn Rivers Drive for trail connections from the Twyn Rivers Day Use Area at Rouge Urban National Park.

## Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must have a valid Goods and Services Tax (GST) number.
* Suppliers must provide a 5% down payment, plus GST, based on the estimated amount of $100,001 to $250,000.
* Suppliers must meet the bonding and insurance requirements for this project.

## Two-Stage Solicitation Process

This posting is Stage Two of a two-stage solicitation process. Stage One consisted of evaluating the qualifications of all interested suppliers. Stage Two invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

## Selection Criteria

* Suppliers will be selected based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information

* Rylan Madge
* Contact Email: [rylan.madge@pc.gc.ca](mailto:rylan.madge@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 371-3685
* Fax: Not available
* Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3

Note: The contact information provided is for Parks Canada officials only. Suppliers must not contact any other officials for project-related inquiries. [1](#)
